name: Planetary Rush
description:
Planetary Rush is a Line-Drawing, Node-Conquest RTS game. "Galcon meets Flight Control."

Draw lines from your planets to send ships. Ships will shoot enemies and take over planets. Try to flank your opponent's ships for best effect.

Use the scroll-wheel to zoom the camera.

1 player vs AI. Mouse controls only.

Note: The web version is not as good as the download version.

Due to the zooming camera, Fullscreen is highly recommended.

Press escape for options.
